description: The Private Office of Nisstyre Bloodstoner.  It is well dress to suit
the man behind the TriPower and the world.  The floor is covered in a large
custom made round rug, it is blue on the outside, and in the middle the
famous 4 bars of the TriPower stand.  The walls to the north are covered
with books, and diffrent files.  The wall to the east is covered with a
painting of the mansion, and a painting of what Torregiano will look like.
To the west the wall is covered in other painting of diffrent things of the
TriPower.  The Tower, The Cannon, and 4 Bars.  To the south Nisstyre's desk
stands, cleaned off except for a few select papers and nicnacs.  To the
north, a large picture window overlooks the backyard and swimming pool.
14731.name: The Office Of Nisstyre

description: {GA lush lawn stretches out around the Bloodstoner Mansion, more
green and lush than any lawn most have seen in the realms.  Trees grow
in random spots in the lawn, various trees, oak, pine and even orange
and peaches.  To the west a large olympic size swimming pool can be
seen, built into the ground.  The lawn continues to border along the
northern end of the mansion.
14713.name: {*T{&he {GNor{gth {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.{x
14776.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: {bPitch black dark water flows all around, revealing nothing of what
could lie beneath the water.  The forest around disallows for any
light, or even the wind to blow through the area, so the waters of
this small lake are dead calm.  All around silence fills the air.{x
14793.name: {bCr{Byst{Cal {BLa{bke{x

description: {bPitch black dark water flows all around, revealing nothing of what
could lie beneath the water.  The forest around disallows for any
light, or even the wind to blow through the area, so the waters of
this small lake are dead calm.  All around silence fills the air.{x
14794.name: {bCr{Byst{Cal {BLa{bke{x

description: The Second Story Bathroom.  The room is white, with tiles all over the
walls.  A white toilet stands to the east, and a shower stall to the west.
To the south a window stands, with a cabinet under it, looking out over the
south lawn and the front gates.
14734.name: Second Floor Bathroom

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.{x
14787.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: You stand at a pair of large gates.  Made from iron above the
gates, letters read out BLOODSTONER MANSION.  Within, you see a lush
lawn, and the mansion itself.  It stands three stories tall, filled
with large windows on the bottom, and smaller ones on the upper
stories.  To the east, you see a greenhouse sticking out.  To the
west, the corner of the mansion has been extended out, to look like a
greenhouse, but its not filled with plants.
14707.name: {cThe {CG{cate{Cs{c Of {RB{rl{Ro{ro{Rd{rs{Rt{ro{Rn{re{Rr {YM{yansion{x

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.{x
14778.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: You enter the tool shed.  Inside you see a workbench, and a ton of tools.
14717.name: The Tool Shed

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.  {x
14772.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: The cobble stone road continues deeper and deeper within the woods.
On either side of you is almost a solid wall of trees and folage.  The
forest around is alive with life, and many other things.  The cobble
stone road continues deep into the forest to the west, and The
Torregiano Roadway can still be seen to the west.
14706.name: {G[{RB{rl{Ro{ro{Rd{rs{Rt{ro{Rn{re{Rr {GR{goad{G]{x

description: The cobble stone road continues deeper and deeper within the woods.
On either side of you is almost a solid wall of trees and folage.  The
forest around is alive with life, and many other things.  The cobble
stone road continues deep into the forest to the west, and The
Torregiano Roadway can still be seen to the west.
14702.name: {G[{RB{rl{Ro{ro{Rd{rs{Rt{ro{Rn{re{Rr {GR{goad{G]{x

description: The bay opens up into a larger building attached to the barn.  An
airship hangs from the building ceiling on chains, being worked on.
Before you stands a large iron whale, an modern airship made from
nothing but metal and engine, unlike its older version of the sailing
ships using a makou gas blimp to float, and engines to propell itself.
The ship is long, and built from large iron plates.  Two large engines
sit in the middle on either side.  Below that area, a fin comes down
which contains the actual airship.  From the large fin, a large crank
shaft extends to the rear, three two sided blades extend from that.
From the main body of the ship, two tails extend back, which hold a
large eray of fins in a box shape.  Two tail fins extend upwards from
the rear of the airship.  You take notice on the main part of the
body, a painting of a woman in a red dress.
14759.name: Airship Hangar: Event Horizon

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.{x
14779.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.  {x
14773.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: {*You stand in the black room, one of the more interesting guest rooms in
the mansion.  {*The whole room is painted black, the walls, the furniture,
and even the bed has {*black sheets and black pillows.  The room is very
dark, and the black curtains on the {*walls are closed to block the
sunlight.  The only shred of light comes from a single {*candle which sits
on the black desk.  {x
14751.name: The Black Room

description: The walkway going to the door.  To the north, a pair of Double doors
keeps unwanted visitors out.  You look at the mansion.  It towers over you,
3 stories.  In each corner of the house a large tower stands, about 2
stories over the roof.  A large fountain sits in the middle of this walkway.
There is a lawn to the west and east, the gates back to the south.
14708.name: {CI{cnfront of the {RB{rl{Ro{ro{Rd{rs{Rt{ro{Rn{re{Rr {YM{yansion{x

description: The cobble stone road continues deeper and deeper within the woods.
On either side of you is almost a solid wall of trees and folage.  The
forest around is alive with life, and many other things.  The cobble
stone road continues deep into the forest to the west, and The
Torregiano Roadway can still be seen to the west.
14704.name: {G[{RB{rl{Ro{ro{Rd{rs{Rt{ro{Rn{re{Rr {GR{goad{G]{x

description: {GA lush lawn stretches out around the Bloodstoner Mansion, more
green and lush than any lawn most have seen in the realms.  Trees grow
in random spots in the lawn, various trees, oak, pine and even orange
and peaches.  To the east a large olympic size swimming pool has been
built into the ground of the lawn.  Some lawn furniture lies around
the cement area of the pool, and doors leading into the mansion.
14765.name: {*T{&he {GNor{gth {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.{x
14780.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: The inside of the car is nothing but black material.  In the front
there is two leather bucket seats, and in the back there is a bench
seat.
14786.name: The 1967 Ford Mustang Shelby 500

description: The Grand Staircase, made from the finest wood in the world.  The
stairs extend upwards into the second and third stories, which holds
the personal chambers of the mansion.  To the south, is the first
floor.
14729.name: {YT{7h{Ye {YGr{7a{Ynd {YSta{7irc{Yase{x [{B1st Floor{x]

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.  {x
14775.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: {bPitch black dark water flows all around, revealing nothing of what
could lie beneath the water.  The forest around disallows for any
light, or even the wind to blow through the area, so the waters of
this small lake are dead calm.  All around silence fills the air.{x
14792.name: {bCr{Byst{Cal {BLa{bke{x

description: {&You stand in the grey room, a mild painted room.  The bed here is
{&covered in grey sheets, and desk, dresser and table is painted in {&a grey
color.  {x
14750.name: The Grey Room

description: {GA large twenty foot wall stands at the end of the very lush and
green lawn that surrounds the Bloodstoner Mansion.  The wall shows to
be built of red bricks, but is mostly covered my vines and other
growth.  A few roses hang from the grown, revealing climbing rose
vines.
14771.name: {*T{&he {GNor{gth {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: The hallway here stretches to the south, and turns to the east
towards a pair of glass doors leading out to the eastern lawn of the
Mansion.  To the north an arch doorway with an oak door leads into the
large kitchen of the Bloodstoner Mansion, which takes up the entire
northern end of the first floor.  To the southeast part of the mansion
is devoted to the parlor of the mansion.  In the northeast corner of
the mansion is the downstairs library.
14724.name: {&E{*ast {&W{*ing {&H{*allway{x

description: This is the third floor west side of the mansion.  The hallway is made
from a dark hardwood, but has no pictures or tables here, just plain.
Several doors to the north, south and west lead to the Guest Bedrooms.
14745.name: Hallway 3rd Floor

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.{x
14790.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: {CAll around, noth{cing bu{Ct a{cn empt{Cy void, eve{crything casted in {Ca cyan
{ccolo{Cr.  Stre{ctchin{Cg endless int{co the horizo{Cn is th{cis la{Cnd, nothing
{caround, no{C wind or sky, only a couple o{cdd figures w{Cho are a{clso
{cstanding here.{x
14804.name: {cT{Che {CE{cndless {cV{Coid{x

description: The great dining hall of the Bloodstoner Mansion stretches along
the western side of the house.  Giant glass windows look west out into
the lush lawn that surrounds the mansion itself.  Past the lawn stands
a twenty foot wall, hiding the Torregiano Roadway on the other side.
In the center of the dining hall is a massive oak table, in which fine
silver candle holders and trays.
14799.name: {CT{che {CN{couthern {CD{cining {CR{coom{x

description: You stand inside a huge barn.  All kinds of diffrent things in here.  A
large work bench sits to the west wall, filled with diffrent kinds of
machinery and metal parts.  To the north, you see a stable filled with
diffrent riding animals, a mustang, a horse, and a chocobo.  To the east, in
one stall, a large iron riding horse stands.  Its totally made from iron and
leather, and has wheels.  On the front of it, it reads "Hardy Daytona
Motorcycle".  And to the far east, the most awed sight in the bar, is a
AIRSHIP.  The airship looks diffrent from the ones in the realms, made
totally from iron, and floats under its own power.  On the side of it reads
"The Highwind"
14716.name: The Barn

description: A large brick stove stands against the north wall of the west
kitchen, with eight large burners and two large ovens built onto it.
Above the stove large windows overlook the northern lawns and the
great swimming pool that is outside.  To the west of the stove stands
a massive iron ice box.  A door to the west leads into the Great
Dining Hall, mostly for the use of severants.  To the east the kitchen
continues.
14727.name: {RT{rhe {RW{rest {RK{ritchen{x

description: {GA large green house extends out from here.  Inside you see all
kinds of diffrent plants growing.  To the north, you can see the
northeast lawn, and to the south is the southeast lawn.  To the east,
a large lawn extends, and you see small holes with flaggs in them.
Also little white balls dot the landscape.  It must be a golf course.
14714.name: {*T{&he {GSou{gth {GE{gast {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: The cobble stone road continues deeper and deeper within the woods.
On either side of you is almost a solid wall of trees and folage.  The
forest around is alive with life, and many other things.  The cobble
stone road continues deep into the forest to the west, and The
Torregiano Roadway can still be seen to the west.
14703.name: {G[{RB{rl{Ro{ro{Rd{rs{Rt{ro{Rn{re{Rr {GR{goad{G]{x

description: A massive room opens up with oak bookcases stretching from the
floor to the ceiling.  Inbetween the cases large windows overlook the
northeast corner of the lush lawn outside.  The shelves themselves are
filled with books of all sizes, color and shapes.  Some books look
very new and fresh, while others look to be covered in dust, and
possibly ancient.  To the west and south stand arch doorways leading
into other places of the Mansion.
14801.name: {GT{ghe {GD{gownstairs {GL{gibrary{x

description: The West Wing houses the great dining hall, a place were heads of
state and other governments meet with the God of Nightmares, and the
King of the Tripower.  The walls are made from oak, with old paintings
of displaying various historic events of the Great Realms on their
ancient canvas.  To the west another arch doorway leads into the
Dining Hall, and north the hallway of the West Wing stretches out.
14721.name: {&W{*est {&W{*ing {&H{*allway{x

description: {GA large twenty foot wall stands at the end of the very lush and
green lawn that surrounds the Bloodstoner Mansion.  The wall shows to
be built of red bricks, but is mostly covered my vines and other
growth.  A few roses hang from the grown, revealing climbing rose
vines.  Massive windows in the western wall of the mansion reveal the
Great Dining Hall inside.
14764.name: {*T{&he {GNor{gth {GW{gest {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: The stone walls surround a vial layer with almost nothing in it,
just hay covered the damp cold stone floor, and two large trouphs, one
filled with water, the other currently empty, the iron walls stained
red with blood.  There are no lights, but the sound of something
moving about echos against the walls.  The stench of the room is
massive, the smell of death.
14821.name: {-G{-o{-r{--{-G{-o{-r{-'{-s {-C{-h{-a{-m{-b{-e{-r{-s{x

description: {bThis is another guest bedroom of the mansion.  This room, is colored in
a deep blue.  {bThe walls are covered in a deep blue, in a ocean pattern.
The bed is covered in a {bdeep blue sheet, with blue pillows on it.  There
is also a dresser and a desk in the {broom which has been painted blue.
14738.name: The Blue Room

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.{x
14782.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: You stand on the roof of the Bloodstoner Mansion.  You can see all around
you, the green yards of the mansion.  To the north, the wall of New Thalos
can be seen, and the top of some its more taller buildings.  Past New
Thalos, the Great Northern Mountain Range rises above the clouds.  To the
east, you can see The Sea Of Swords, with its blue waters.  To the near
south, you can see the Sands Of Sorrow.
14753.name: {&T{*he {YRo{7oft{Yop {Co{cf {Ct{che {RB{rl{Ro{ro{Rd{rs{Rt{ro{Rn{re{Rr {CM{cansion{x

description: {bPitch black dark water flows all around, revealing nothing of what
could lie beneath the water.  The forest around disallows for any
light, or even the wind to blow through the area, so the waters of
this small lake are dead calm.  All around silence fills the air.{x
14795.name: {bCr{Byst{Cal {BLa{bke{x

description: {GA lush lawn stretches out around the Bloodstoner Mansion, more
green and lush than any lawn most have seen in the realms.  Trees grow
in random spots in the lawn, various trees, oak, pine and even apple
and peaches.
14770.name: {*T{&he {GSou{gth{Gern {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: Deeper into the barn, you come to a center room.  Before you stands
three bays in the barn, each holding something.  To the north the
mammoth airship known as "The Event Horizon" is hanging from its
docking pay, waiting to be used.  To the west the bay holds a few
vehicles, and to the east is a work shop.  The barn stands infront of
you, the center of it is clear.
14758.name: Deeper into the Barn

description: {CAll around, noth{cing bu{Ct a{cn empt{Cy void, eve{crything casted in {Ca cyan
{ccolo{Cr.  Stre{ctchin{Cg endless int{co the horizo{Cn is th{cis la{Cnd, nothing
{caround, no{C wind or sky, only a couple o{cdd figures w{Cho are a{clso
{cstanding here.{x
14806.name: {cT{Che {CE{cndless {cV{Coid{x

description: {GA large twenty foot wall stands at the end of the very lush and
green lawn that surrounds the Bloodstoner Mansion.  The wall shows to
be built of red bricks, but is mostly covered my vines and other
growth.  A few roses hang from the grown, revealing climbing rose
vines.
14768.name: {*T{&he {GNor{gth {GE{gast {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: {rYou stand in the RED ROOM.  This guest bedroom has been decorated in
everything {ra red color.  The wallpaper is a dark, deep red rose color.
The dresser is made {rfrom a hard wood, that is a redish tint.  The bed, is
covered in deep red sheets {rand red pillows.  {x
14736.name: The Red Room

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.{x
14791.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: {GA large twenty foot wall stands at the end of the very lush and
green lawn that surrounds the Bloodstoner Mansion.  The wall shows to
be built of red bricks, but is mostly covered my vines and other
growth.  A few roses hang from the grown, revealing climbing rose
vines.
14766.name: {*T{&he {GNor{gth {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: {GYou stand at the west lawn.  To the west the yard is filled with
trees, all diffrent types.  To the east, you see a window looking into
the house, and a large orc cook standing near it.  To the north, a
large barn stands, about as high as the house.  To the south, is the
lawn, and to the north is the backyard.  Massive windows in the
western wall of the mansion reveal the Great Dining Hall inside.
14710.name: {*T{&he {GSou{gth {GW{gest {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: {x
{*  The horr{&id small o{rf stomach acid churn{rs about in{& what woul{*d be knee
{*deep in th{&e stomach {rof Gor-Gor.  Rotting{r corpses a{&nd rusted {*armor
{*strewn abo{&ut floatin{rg around in a greeni{rsh yellow {&fluid, slo{*wly being
{*dissolved.{&  Oddly en{rough large maggots m{rove about {&in the pil{*es of
{*rotting fl{&esh and ar{rmor, begining to mov{re slowly t{&owards you{*rself.{x
14822.name: {*Inside {-G{-o{-r{--{-G{-o{-r{-'{-s {YSt{yoma{Ych{x

description: The Second Story.  The Grand Staircase extends down into the lower
half of the mansion, and goes upwards into the third level.  A hallway
extends to the east and west.  To the north, you see a door leading
into a office.  To the south, you see a toilet through the doorway.
14730.name: {YT{7h{Ye {YGr{7a{Ynd {YSta{7irc{Yase{x [{B2nd Floor{x]

description: {%The purple guest room.  This room is painted all purple.  Everything
{%in the room is purple, the sheets, bed, desk and dresser.  {%Even the
candles on the walls are purple.....  {x
14748.name: The Purple Room

description: The cobble stone road continues deeper and deeper within the woods.
On either side of you is almost a solid wall of trees and folage.  The
forest around is alive with life, and many other things.  The road
takes a sharp turn to the north, towards a brick wall and a pair of
iron gates, and also continues back west to The Torregiano Roadway.
14701.name: {G[{RB{rl{Ro{ro{Rd{rs{Rt{ro{Rn{re{Rr {GR{goad{G]{x

description: This is the third floor east side of the mansion.  The hallway is made
from a dark hardwood, but has no pictures or tables here, just plain.
Several doors to the north, south and east lead to the Guest Bedrooms.
14743.name: Hallway 3rd Floor

description: You stand in the white guest room, one of the more annoying rooms found
in the mansion.  Everything in the room is pure white, the bed, sheets, and
the desk and dresser is white.
14747.name: The White Room

description: {GA lush lawn stretches out around the Bloodstoner Mansion, more
green and lush than any lawn most have seen in the realms.  Trees grow
in random spots in the lawn, various trees, oak, pine and even apple
and peaches.
14711.name: {*T{&he {GNor{gth {GW{gest {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: You stand inside the god of nightmare's bedroom.  The walls, are
painted black, and candles burn on all four walls.  A large coffin is
to the north, closed.  As you look closer at the coffin, you see very
fine carvings on the sides and top of it.  In the center of the coffin
is a circle, and the TriPower Bars, made from red rubies.  There is a
large desk to the east, and to the west, a walk-in closet.
14742.name: The Bedroom Of Nisstyre

description: {GYou stand in the Southwest Lawn.  A large grey tower, towers above you.
You look up, but can't see inside the windows on the top of it.  The corner
of this part of the house, has been extended out into a glass greenhouse
type area.  Inside, you can see a sitting room.  To the east you see the
main walk, and to the north you can see back yard, and a large barn.
14709.name: {*T{&he {GSou{gth {GW{gest {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: {BBefore you stands a large, olympic size swimming pool.  It has been
built into the ground.  Around the pool a patio surrounds it.  On the
patio are chairs and lounges.  In the pool a few devices float ontop,
for people to sit on.  To the north, you see the wooded area over the
wall.  To the west, is a large barn and to the east is a tool shed.
To the south a pair of glass doors leads into the mansion.  Inside,
you see something like a sitting room.  As you look up, you see the
mansion towering over you.
14712.name: {*T{&he {GNor{gth {GL{gaw{Gn{x [{BPool{x]

description: {GYou stand in the northeast lawn.  There isn't much to see here.  To
southeast tower hovers above you, and you see the lawn extending to the
north.  To the west the walkway to the mansion stands.
14715.name: {*T{&he {GSou{gth{Gern {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: {GA lush lawn stretches out around the Bloodstoner Mansion, more
green and lush than any lawn most have seen in the realms.  Trees grow
in random spots in the lawn, various trees, oak, pine and even apple
and peaches.  Massive windows in the western wall of the mansion
reveal the Great Dining Hall inside.
14763.name: {*T{&he {GW{gest {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: The hallway ends here at a pair of large double glass doors that
leads to the outside, into the Eastern Lawn.  Two arch doorways stand
to the north and south, the north door leading into the Downstairs
Library of the Mansion, and the door to the south leads into the
Parlor of the Bloodstoner Mansion.  The hallway continues to the west
and from even this distance it can be seen that it turns south.  Also
from here another door leading north can be seen.
14800.name: {&E{*ast {&W{*ing {&H{*allway{x

description: {CAll around, noth{cing bu{Ct a{cn empt{Cy void, eve{crything casted in {Ca cyan
{ccolo{Cr.  Stre{ctchin{Cg endless int{co the horizo{Cn is th{cis la{Cnd, nothing
{caround, no{C wind or sky, only a couple o{cdd figures w{Cho are a{clso
{cstanding here.{x
14805.name: {cT{Che {CE{cndless {cV{Coid{x

description: {GA large twenty foot wall stands at the end of the very lush and
green lawn that surrounds the Bloodstoner Mansion.  The wall shows to
be built of red bricks, but is mostly covered my vines and other
growth.  A few roses hang from the grown, revealing climbing rose
vines.
14718.name: {*T{&he {GSou{gth {GW{gest {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: The second story west side of the mansion.  The hallway is made from a
dark grain of wood.  Some paintings hang from the wall, and a few tables.
To the north and west, are guestrooms, which are welcome to any guest of the
mansion.  To the south, a clostest stands filled with towels.
14732.name: Hallway 2nd Floor

description: The large parlor of the mansion opens up, a room filled with large
windows overlooking the lawn, and many paintings on the wallpaper
covered walls.  The room is filled with all sorts of furniture,
several couches and chairs, a large grand panio, and even a billiard
table.  A large gas light hangs down from the ceiling, a large plaster
design encircles the connection of the light.  A shelf stands in one
corner, filled with pipes and other various smoking devices.
14723.name: {*T{&he {*M{&ansion {*P{&arlor{x

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.  {x
14789.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: A small tunnel leads underground north into the mansion, just big
enough for a cat or other small animals to enter.  The floor of this
tunnel is made of nice cobble stone, and the walls are built of red
brick, very fancy for felines to enter into the mansion.
14823.name: {CT{che {RC{ra{Rt {GEn{gtran{Gce{x

description: {gThis is the green room, a guest bedroom covered in a deep forest green
{gcolor creating an effect.  The walls are covered in a leaf green, and the
{gbed is covered with deep green pillows and sheets.  A dresser and a desk
stand {gagainst another wall, but do not match the green color, they are
made from a dark {ghardwood.  {x
14735.name: The Green Room

description: You stand at the top of the Grand Staircase.  Down, you see the
landings of the second and first floor.  To either side of you, a
hallway extends east or west.  You see another bathroom to the south,
and a larger bedroom to the north.
14741.name: {YT{7h{Ye {YGr{7a{Ynd {YSta{7irc{Yase{x [{B3rd Floor{x]

description: The massive oak table stretches here in the main part of the giant
dining hall of the Bloodstoner Mansion.  During the day when the
morning sun shines through the massive giant windows looking out west
cause the silverware on the table to shine brightly, usually when his
lordship, king and god is sitting at the end of the table.  The walls
are covered with different, ancient and very expensive paintings of
the lordships past.  The dining hall continues to stretch to the north
and south.
14798.name: {CT{che {CM{cain {CD{cining {CR{coom{x

description: The large work bay here is filled with all kinds of tools.  The
walls of the bay is nothing but large wooden work benches and
cabinets.  The walls are covered in all sorts of tools, on peg boards.
A single window is on the eastern wall looking out into a field.  In
the center of the bay is a giant hydralic lift.
14760.name: Garage Work Bay

description: A massive brick stove sits to the south, built into the wall with a
large chimney above it to catch the smoke and smells of any cooking
that goes on with it.  In the center of the room stands a large, thick
table.  Pots and pans, and other cooking utensels hang from a rack
above the table.  Around the walls also stand counters and cabinets.
To the north a pair of large glass doors lead out to the northern
lawn, and the pool.  To the west the kitchen continues, with another
stove and an iron ice box.  To the east a door leads into the East
Wing of the Mansion.
14726.name: {RT{rhe {RM{rain {RK{ritchen{x

description: A massive entrance hall opens up, with an arch ceiling above.  The
ceiling above reveals a painting of the creation of the realms,
displaying the two gods, Nisstyre and Teron, creating the races they
had once loved from their home enviroment in the continent of Faerun.
The great hall opens up to reveal the rest of the mansion.  To the
north a massive oak staircase leads upwards into the upper floors of
the Bloodstoner Mansion.  To either side large arch doorways lead into
the east and west wings of the mansion.  On the wall near the door
stands several hooks, for visitors to hand their coats on, and a chair
for them to sit down on, and remove their boots.
14720.name: {*T{&he {*F{&ront {*E{&ntrance{x

description: You enter the second floor east side of the mansion.  The hallway built
from a dark hardwood.  Several doors are to the north, south and east.  To
the north, another guest bedroom stand to the north.  To the east you see a
room filled with a ton of books, which must be a library.  To the south, the
door is closed and locked.
14733.name: Hallway 2nd Floor

description: The bay to the west is somewhat larger, and stores the new "motorized carriages"
that are ran off of Makou Engines.  You see two vehicles before you, a new
1268 Makou Charger, and an old beat up prototype known as the Shelby GT.
Both cars are parked side by side and ready to drive.
14761.name: Car Storage Bay

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.{x
14777.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.{x
14788.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: {CAll around, noth{cing bu{Ct a{cn empt{Cy void, eve{crything casted in {Ca cyan
{ccolo{Cr.  Stre{ctchin{Cg endless int{co the horizo{Cn is th{cis la{Cnd, nothing
{caround, no{C wind or sky, only a couple o{cdd figures w{Cho are a{clso
{cstanding here.{x
14700.name: {cT{Che {CE{cndless {cV{Coid{x

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.{x
14781.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: You get into the car and see the two leather black front bucket
seats.  The dash sits infront of you, four round gages extending from
left to right.  In the far left "pod" is the engine and radiator temp
gauges.  Three pods to the left is your speedometer, and next to that
is your Tach.  The fuel gage is the last pod.  The car's interior is
black, two bucket seats in the front, bench seat in the back.  The
chrome shifter stands between the front seats.
14785.name: {&The {C1268 {GMa{gk{Gou {YG{RT{YO{x {RCh{rarg{Rer{x

description: The third story bathroom.  The room is white, with tiles all over the
walls.  A white toilet stands to the east, and a shower stall to the west.
To the south a window stands, with a cabinet under it, looking out over the
south lawn and the front gates.
14744.name: Third Story Bathroom

description: {CAll around, noth{cing bu{Ct a{cn empt{Cy void, eve{crything casted in {Ca cyan
{ccolo{Cr.  Stre{ctchin{Cg endless int{co the horizo{Cn is th{cis la{Cnd, nothing
{caround, no{C wind or sky, only a couple o{cdd figures w{Cho are a{clso
{cstanding here.{x
14808.name: {cT{Che {CE{cndless {cV{Coid{x

description: {bYou are floating in a large, cement swimming pool.  All around you blue
water {bflows around your body.  People also swim all around you, enjoying
the nice {bcool waters of the swimming pool.  A few floating devices circle
around.
14752.name: The Olympic Swimming Pool

14803.name: Makou City Airship Race Mob Holding Cell

description: A large arch doorway to the west leads into the main area of the
Great Dining Hall, a place large events take place, and other various
meetings by the King of the Tripower.  The oak walls display now
pictures of people, possible family members of The Bloodstoners, or
other historical type people of the Great Realms.  The hallway of the
West Wing stretches to the south, leading towards the front door, and
the Great Hallway.  To the north a small door leads into the kitchen
of the Mansion.
14728.name: {&W{*est {&W{*ing {&H{*allway{x

description: Bloodstoner Road, named after the only resident on the road stands
before you.  A gold sign hangs at the corner just to the back, reading
"Bloodstoner Road".  The road is made up of cobble stone, and
continues deep within the thick forest.  Back west is the Torrigano
Roadway.
14705.name: {G[{RB{rl{Ro{ro{Rd{rs{Rt{ro{Rn{re{Rr {GR{goad{G]{x

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.{x
14783.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: {GA lush lawn stretches out around the Bloodstoner Mansion, more
green and lush than any lawn most have seen in the realms.  Trees grow
in random spots in the lawn, various trees, oak, pine and even apple
and peaches.
14719.name: {*T{&he {GSou{gth {GE{gast {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: {GA lush lawn stretches out around the Bloodstoner Mansion, more
green and lush than any lawn most have seen in the realms.  Trees grow
in random spots in the lawn, various trees, oak, pine and even apple
and peaches.
14767.name: {*T{&he {GNor{gth {GE{gast {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: {CAll around, noth{cing bu{Ct a{cn empt{Cy void, eve{crything casted in {Ca cyan
{ccolo{Cr.  Stre{ctchin{Cg endless int{co the horizo{Cn is th{cis la{Cnd, nothing
{caround, no{C wind or sky, only a couple o{cdd figures w{Cho are a{clso
{cstanding here.{x
14807.name: {cT{Che {CE{cndless {cV{Coid{x

description: {bPitch black dark water flows all around, revealing nothing of what
could lie beneath the water.  The forest around disallows for any
light, or even the wind to blow through the area, so the waters of
this small lake are dead calm.  All around silence fills the air.{x
14796.name: {bCr{Byst{Cal {BLa{bke{x

description: The great dining hall of the Bloodstoner Mansion stretches along
the western side of the house.  Giant glass windows look west out into
the lush lawn that surrounds the mansion itself.  Past the lawn stands
a twenty foot wall, hiding the Torregiano Roadway on the other side.
In the center of the dining hall is a massive oak table, in which fine
silver candle holders and trays.
14797.name: {CT{che {CS{couthern {CD{cining {CR{coom{x

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.{x
14784.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: {gAll around the trees stand, tall and somewhat looking snarled.
Above the tops of the trees block the sky, disallowing any kind of
light to enter to the floor of the forest.  An erie silence hangs over
the entire area, no sounds of wildlife, not even the sound of leaves.
A small path leads way through the knarled trees.  {x
14774.name: {gT{Gh{ge {RN{ri{Rg{rh{Rt{rm{Ra{rr{Re {GFo{gre{Gst{x

description: Thousands and Thousands of books line the walls, going from the floor to
the ceiling.  A ladder hangs from the books, which seems to be able to be
pushed around the room.  A staircase leads up, going to a second story of
books, which makes it easier to get them from.  Several desks stand in the
middle of the room, with Makou Gas Lamps on them, and open books.  A large
picture window looks out over the golf course in the east lawn.
14740.name: The Library Of Bloodstoner

description: {GA lush lawn stretches out around the Bloodstoner Mansion, more
green and lush than any lawn most have seen in the realms.  Trees grow
in random spots in the lawn, various trees, oak, pine and even apple
and peaches.  To the west a pair of large glass doors leads into the
eastern side of the Bloodstoner Mansion.  To the east the large wall
opens up into what looks like a forest area to the east of the lawn.
The lawn itself continues to the north and south.
14769.name: {*T{&he {GE{gast {GL{gaw{Gn{x

description: A large hallway runs to the north here in the Eastern Wing of the
mansion.  To the east an arch doorway leads into the Parlor of the
Mansion, which overlooks the southeast corner of the great and lush
lawn that surrounds the mansion.  Northwards the kitchen of the
mansion sits, along with the Downstairs Library.
14722.name: {&E{*ast {&W{*ing {&H{*allway{x

description: {GA large twenty foot wall stands at the end of the very lush and
green lawn that surrounds the Bloodstoner Mansion.  The wall shows to
be built of red bricks, but is mostly covered my vines and other
growth.  A few roses hang from the grown, revealing climbing rose
vines.
14762.name: {*T{&he {GSou{gth {GE{gast {GL{gaw{Gn{x

14734.name: (no short description)~

F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

14822.name: {*A {yM{ga{yg{gg{yo{gt{x~

M DEATH 14821 100~

14825.name: {*T{&h{*e {&B{*l{&a{*c{&k {*a{&n{*d {&W{*h{&i{*t{&e {*C{&a{*t{x~

14826.name: {*The {bBlue {&Grey {*Cat{x~

14700.room_name: {CA weird lo{coking pers{Con stands {chere, wit{Ch one leg {cand one ey{Ce, looking {clike a gr{Cey hotdog{c.{x
14700.name: {CJ{ce{Cr{cr{Cy{x~

M EXALL 14996 3~
M EXALL 14997 2~
M EXALL 14998 1~
M EXALL 14999 0~
M ACT 14999 is dead!!~

description:
To Enter The Mansion, Please Say....
"entrance"
The Doorman will disappear into the house
and seek out Nisstyre, and he will either deny
or allow you in. If the doorman does not come
back that means Nisstyre is not around, and if
he comes back saying you cannot enter, then
Nisstyre does not want any visitors. If he comes
back and says your allowed in, say
"thank-you"
And you will be transfered in.
14701.room_name: The Doorman stands here, watching the door.
14701.name: The Doorman~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M GIVE 14703 pizzatorrquest~
M SPEECH 14701 entrance~
M EXALL 14704 0~

description: You See Nisstyre, God Of The Nightmares, only 1/4th his size.
14702.room_name: MiniNiss stands here, giving a weird umpa lumpa vibe.
14702.name: MiniNiss~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
Before you stands a hulking beast of iron.  A large thing, that
resembles and bicycle stands here, a large iron engine sits on it,
rumbling under the power of combustable makou gas.  A large light
stands on the front, and handle bars wrap around the front.  A large
leather seat sits in the middle, with several saddle bags on each
side.  The pipes and body seem to be dipped in crome.
14703.room_name: The Makou Motorcycle stands here, rumbling loud and smooth.
14703.name: The {*Ha{&r{*dy {RD{ray{*t{rona{x~
